ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened,   +   1/2 cup unsalted butter, softened, 4 cups confectioners' sugar, 2 tablespoons heavy cream,   +   1/2 teaspoon salt,   +   1/2 teaspoon coconut flavoring, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract,   +   1/2 cup sweetened shredded coconut, 1 cup sweetened shredded coconut, toasted
nutrition: Total Fat 11g 14%, Saturated Fat 7g 36%, Cholesterol 27mg 9%, Sodium 109mg 5%, Total Carbohydrate 28g 10%, Dietary Fiber 1g 2%, Total Sugars 27g, Protein 1g, Calcium 12mg 1%, Iron 0mg 1%, Potassium 37mg 1%
